verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees אֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> I will lift up עֵ֭ינַי <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הֶהָרִ֑ים <S%H2022><s%> unto the hills מֵ֝אַ֗יִן <S%H370><s%> from whence יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> cometh עֶזְרִֽי׃ <S%H5828><s%> my help
עֶ֭זְרִי <S%H5828><s%> My help מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [cometh] from the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> and earth

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> He will not suffer לַמּ֣וֹט <S%H4132><s%> to be moved רַגְלֶ֑ךָ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot אַל־ <S%H408><s%> shall not יָ֝נ֗וּם <S%H5123><s%> thee will not slumber שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8104><s%> he that keepeth

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will neither יָ֭נוּם <S%H5123><s%> shall neither slumber וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִישָׁ֑ן <S%H3462><s%> nor sleep שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> Behold he that keepeth יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H8104><s%> [is] thy keeper יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צִ֝לְּךָ֗ <S%H6738><s%> [is] thy shade עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> hand יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3225><s%> upon thy right

יוֹמָ֗ם <S%H3119><s%> thee by day הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> The sun לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יַכֶּ֗כָּה <S%H5221><s%> shall not smite וְיָרֵ֥חַ <S%H3394><s%> nor the moon בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ <S%H8104><s%> shall preserve מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> thee from all evil יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> he shall preserve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> thy soul

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> shall preserve צֵאתְךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> thy going out וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ <S%H935><s%> and thy coming in מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from this time forth and even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> evermore
